tableRowTitles: Analysts / Intuitive Thinking / rationality and intellect
Diplomats / Intuitive Feeling / empathy and diplomatic skills
Sentinels / Observant Judjing / practicality and stability
Explorers / Observant Prospecting / ingenuity and flexibility

typeGroupMap.title: Visionaries
typeGroupMap.description: Deep thinkers and idealists who are future-focused, introspective, and imaginative

typeGroupMap.title: Catalysts
typeGroupMap.description: Energetic change-makers who spark ideas, lead movements, and inspire others

typeGroupMap.title: Artisans
typeGroupMap.description: Grounded realists upholding tradition, bringing stability via practical skill and dedication

typeGroupMap.title: Navigators
typeGroupMap.description: Energetic actors who engage others through charisma, action, and social intelligence

typeGroupMap.title: Mentors
typeGroupMap.description: Purposeful leaders who guide others with insight, structure, and vision

typeGroupMap.title: Explorers
typeGroupMap.description: Curious minds who thrive on ideas, innovation, and endless discovery

typeGroupMap.title: Stewards
typeGroupMap.description: Principled organizers who lead with structure, duty, and ethical resolve

typeGroupMap.title: Harmonizers
typeGroupMap.description: Empathetic and collaborative types who value emotional connection and shared meaning

typeGroupMap.title: Realists
typeGroupMap.description: Practical decision-makers who value efficiency and results

typeGroupMap.title: Guardians
typeGroupMap.description: Loyal caregivers who protect harmony, traditions, and personal well-being

typeGroupMap.title: Architects
typeGroupMap.description: Strategic Executors who drive progress through logic, structure, and decisive action

typeGroupMap.title: Balancers
typeGroupMap.description: Types who blend reason with empathy, and creativity with tradition

typeGroupMap.title: Responders
typeGroupMap.description: Responsive and situationally aware types who lead with empathy or action under pressure

typeGroupMap.title: Free Spirits
typeGroupMap.description: Authentic and expressive individuals who seek beauty, connection, and freedom
